title: Championship Riven
body: I think it's time to let us buy championship riven, cause a lot of people want to buy it , and it has been a long time since the last time.

replies.body: It's classed as Limited Edition. On the off chance that it ever becomes available for purchase again, it will only be when there's a full Championship team comp 2 seasons from now.

Re-releasing that skin would make it lose virtually 100% of its merit. One of the reasons that skin is considered so valuable is because it is rare. This is coming from someone who doesn't own that skin as well.
That is the most lethal dose of top kekkery i have seen in my life, it was available in store just like most other skins so judging by your logic Championship Shyvana and Thresh are rare too?

Don't be an idiot. Championship Thresh has been out twice, nowhere near as rare. Championship Shyvana came out this year and a lot of people would have bought her, if not, Championship Shyvana can come out again next year since she is only Legacy. Championship Riven only came out once long ago, so not many people have her. Twice, if you count people at Worlds getting her.
i agree. i have the {{champion:412}}  and {{champion:102}}  skin. i want the {{champion:92}}  one because it looks cool
Championship Riven will only be available in 2016 and so on but then the game might've half died by then.
They aren't as rare as Championship Riven, they were both available this year.
